description: a(n+1) = a(n) - n (if n is odd), a(n+1) = a(n) * n (if n is even).
links: Reinhard Zumkeller, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..500
prog: (Haskell)a047906 n = a047906_list !! (n-1)a047906_list = 1 : zipWith uncurry                           (cycle [(-), (*)]) (zip a047906_list [1..])-- _Reinhard Zumkeller_, Nov 14 2013
author: Miklos SZABO (mike(AT)ludens.elte.hu)
